title: OnOptions
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: 6 Places to Find Your Next Freelance Hire
items.description: Freelance platform Fiverr published a list of the fastest growing cities for solopreneurs—the results may surprise you.

items.title: The Reddit CEO Is Making a Big Change Because 1 Part of the Site ‘Sucks’
items.description: Reddit CEO Steve Huffman says the platform is deprioritizing a major subreddit in favor of more personalized feeds. Some users are concerned.

items.title: Amazon Is Considering a Big Change to Its Distribution Network

items.title: Spotify users lamented Wrapped in 2024. This year, the company brought back an old favorite and made it less about AI
items.description: Spotify received blowback in 2024 for going all-in on AI at the last minute.

items.title: Detroit’s bizarre romance with its very own RoboCop statue reaches happy ending, 15 years after love/hate crowdfunding campaign kicked it off
items.description: The statue campaign appears to have started around 2010 when Detroit Mayor Dave Bing was tagged in a tweet about Philadelphia's "Rocky" statue.

items.title: Apple Just Lost a Key Designer—Many Are Happy to See Him Go
